original_text: Forasmuch as this people refuseth the waters of Shiloah that go softly, and rejoice in Rezin and Remaliah's son;
korean_text: 이 백성이 천천히 흐르는 실로아 물을 버리고 르신과 르말리야의 아들을 기뻐하느니라

sentences.original_text: Forasmuch as this people refuseth the waters of Shiloah
sentences.korean_translation: 이 백성이 실로아 물을 거부하는 까닭에

sentences.original_text: and rejoice in Rezin and Remaliah's son
